title: SSH WARNING: REMOTE HOST IDENTIFICATION HAS CHANGED!

content.raw:
launching Gazebo:

Running the following command:

at NOW <start_ros.sh

ret: True

err: @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ @
WARNING: REMOTE HOST IDENTIFICATION HAS CHANGED! @
@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ IT IS
POSSIBLE THAT SOMEONE IS DOING SOMETHING NASTY! Someone could be
eavesdropping on you right now (man-in-the-middle attack)! It is also
possible that a host key has just been changed. The fingerprint for
the ECDSA key sent by the remote host is
eb:3b:3a:d5:bf:ec:ee:6d:9d:50:3f:db:b4:de:e8:4d. Please contact your
system administrator. Add correct host key in
/var/www/.ssh/known_hosts to get rid of this message. Offending ECDSA
key in /var/www/.ssh/known_hosts:1 remove with: ssh-keygen -f
"/var/www/.ssh/known_hosts" -R ec2-50-19-0-175.compute-1.amazonaws.com
Password authentication is disabled to avoid man-in-the-middle
attacks. Keyboard-interactive authentication is disabled to avoid
man-in-the-middle attacks. warning: commands will be executed using
/bin/sh job 1 at Tue Oct 9 21:04:00 2012

launching Gazebo:

Running the following command:

at NOW <start_ros.sh

ret: True

err: @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ @ WARNING: REMOTE HOST IDENTIFICATION HAS CHANGED! @ @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ IT IS POSSIBLE THAT SOMEONE IS DOING SOMETHING NASTY! Someone could be eavesdropping on you right now (man-in-the-middle attack)! It is also possible that a host key has just been changed. The fingerprint for the ECDSA key sent by the remote host is eb:3b:3a:d5:bf:ec:ee:6d:9d:50:3f:db:b4:de:e8:4d. Please contact your system administrator. Add correct host key in /var/www/.ssh/known_hosts to get rid of this message. Offending ECDSA key in /var/www/.ssh/known_hosts:1 remove with: ssh-keygen -f "/var/www/.ssh/known_hosts" -R ec2-50-19-0-175.compute-1.amazonaws.com Password authentication is disabled to avoid man-in-the-middle attacks. Keyboard-interactive authentication is disabled to avoid man-in-the-middle attacks. warning: commands will be executed using /bin/sh job 1 at Tue Oct 9 21:04:00 2012
